name: Mercury
description: The smallest and closest planet to the Sun, known for its extreme temperature variations.

name: Venus
description: Second from the Sun, Venus has a thick atmosphere that traps heat, making it the hottest planet.

name: Earth
description: The third planet from the Sun and the only astronomical object known to support life.

name: Mars
description: Known as the Red Planet, Mars is home to the tallest volcano and the deepest canyon in the solar system.

name: Jupiter
description: The largest planet in our solar system, Jupiter has a strong magnetic field and dozens of moons.

name: Saturn
description: Famous for its stunning ring system, Saturn is a gas giant composed mostly of hydrogen and helium.

name: Uranus
description: An ice giant with a pale blue color, Uranus rotates on its side and has faint rings.

name: Neptune
description: The farthest known planet from the Sun, Neptune has supersonic winds and a deep blue color.
